variety.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting
variety.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
Occasionally working from home adds variety to a job.
variety.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a type of thing, such as a plant or animal, that is different from others in the same group
variety.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
variety.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a particular type of person or thing â€“ often used humorously
variety.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Lon has no patience with anything of the child variety.
variety.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: They hold debates on a wide variety of topics.
Fruit is eaten by a huge variety of animals and birds.
There is a seemingly infinite variety of beers to choose from.
A rich variety of plants grows here.
There is a bewildering variety of roses to choose from.
The market has an amazing variety of fresh fish.
variety.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a particular type of a product
variety.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The fashionable bar sells over 50 different varieties of beer.
